Name: Puzzle Game: Lee inside TV
About the game: In Lee inside TV you have to think outside the box and use the classical mechanics of platformer games to solve puzzles and or finish the level. - Each level has a new challenge and new mechanics to use - Over than 50 levels (more levels are coming!) - Almost 20 collectibles and each one is also a Steam Achievement (the collectibles will show on your room after you get them). It'll be fun! - Pay attention to the texts with tips in the levels and use them (sometimes literally) - Nice pixel art graphics and chiptune soundtrack Story: Lee is just a regular straw-man boy that is broken and has a room that looks empty and has no style. To solve this problems he decided to join a TV show called 'One Screen Challenge' to make some money and get some nice hidden collectibles. What he didn't know is that this TV show would somehow put him inside the TV to face dangerous challenges...
